subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deron Williams had 20 assists to go with 17 points Monday and the Utah Jazz used a late 16-0 run to pull out a 116-110 victory over the visiting Dallas Mavericks.
snippet: Deron Williams had 20 assists to go with 17 points Monday and the Utah Jazz used a late 16-0 run to pull out a 116-110 victory over the visiting Dallas Mavericks.
